item.title: Topological Sort. Algorithms Series
item.description: Topological sort can be applied in scheduling problems. Those types of problems can be solved when: tasks and precedence constraints are defined; cycles are detected and removed. Implementation of cycle detection can be found here. Test should check that reverse post order is correct. @Test void shouldReturnPostOrder() { DirectedGraph directedGraph = new DirectedGraph(4); directedGraph.addEdge(1, 0); directedGraph.addEdge(0, 3); directedGraph.addEdge(1, 2); TopologicalSort topologicalSort = new TopologicalSort(directedGraph); LinkedList<Integer> expected = new LinkedList<>(Arrays.asList(3, 0, 2, 1)); assertEquals(expected, topologicalSort.
